Title: Settings
Creator: Creator
RepeatSelectionItemTriggerOnlyOnce: Repeat selection item Trigger only once
TryToBlockKeyboardFocus: Try to block keyboard focus (do not press Tab)
HighContrastFocusOnGrayBackground: High contrast focus on gray background
OptimizeTisplayOfRichTextBoxes: Optimize the display of rich text boxes
TurnOffAutomaticCheckForUpdates: Turn off automatic check for updates
